name: com.mrzee.scriptableobject.integrations.nakamaserver
description:
A custom package for Nakama Server basic integration.
Please add Nakama SDK from Asset Store before including this package in the project
LINK: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/network/nakama-81338
Use facebook service for FB authentication.

samples.description: Contains samples for Nakama Server integration.
